author: Reuters Editorial
title: Olympics-Bobsleigh-Canada and Germany in dead-heat for gold
text:
PYEONGCHANG, South Korea, Feb 19 (Reuters) - Canada’s Justin Kripps and Germany’s Francesco Friedrich won gold medals after a dead-heat in the men’s Olympic two-man bobsleigh on Monday.
Kripps and four-times world champion Friedrich both finished with identical times of three minutes 16.86 seconds. Latvia’s Oskars Melbardis took bronze.
It was the first dead-heat in the Olympic two-man bobsleigh competition since Nagano in 1998. (Reporting by James Pearson, editing by Ed Osmond)
